I generally dream when I nap in the afternoons. This dream occured not too long ago:

I was all grown up ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)"). And driving a car!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") 

Suddenly I see someone asking for a ride. I look carefully, it's bald Elon Musk!!! I stop my vehicle and see that his Tesla has turned into a Transformer Cerebrus and refuses to turn back. Elon wants to go to a motel. 

I, of course, take him to my place. Then we go on a tour of the town , visiting all the fun places. Elon is very co-operative. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

We went to all the tourist spots around the world (makes no sense, I was with him at The Statue of Liberty one minute, and the next minute I was at Eiffel tower.....) While he was leaving, I asked him if we could stay in touch. He said "No, why should we?" I could only stutter "But.But..BUT!!" He said that I was not 'significant' enough. I started bawling my eyes out.

Then he started going on a stupid rant abt how attachments don't matter and how he would have ditched SpaceX if there were no profits. He essentially became how I picture Mortimer Kerman in my head.

Then there was a huge earthquake, and Elon fell in a crater.....

Then I woke up, and one of my teachers was shaking me awake, looking very worried. Turns out I was napping and all of a sudden started sobbing in my sleep, **in the library!**

And the aftermath was pretty embarrassing..... Very embarrassing...

I've had by far the most vivid lucid dream I've had in all time today. As in, it literally felt and looked like when awake, with amazing realism.

From what I recall (it was about 7 hours ago), I noticed something weird going on, and did a nasal reality check. I could breathe normally beyond a shadow of a doubt, so I knew I was dreaming. I was actually surprised by this, due to the incredible vividness. Felt like I was normally awake, but in another place.

I don't remember the exact details, but I started off walking on the street, and went to a corner store to buy something. Bought it for about 5 currency units which I spawned inside my pocket by thinking, got the change, and started walking towards the exit. Just as I was leaving, someone I didn't exactly want to be there showed up, and I attempted to de-spawn them at least twice, with no success (I've been refraining from speaking out loud, which is WAY more effective, due to being afraid of saying it out loud in real life. Not sure if that's a real risk, though.). So I just went and left, knowing there would be no consequence.

As I was leaving, I thought to myself, it would be nice if I could have a faster mean of transportation. Just as I thought that, my car was waiting for me, properly parked on the street and all. I just reached in my back pocket and got the keys, went inside it (everything looked correct), got ready and went for a drive.

I was driving well, traffic seemed really realistic. The city looked nice. However, I started going up a hill some time after, and a thought struck me: I had no idea what was going on in the REAL world. Literally none of it. I could've been doing something completely inappropriate by now and I wouldn't be able to know it. Just like how a pilot needs his instruments to know where he's at, what's happening around him and what to do during a storm or IFR, except my instruments were gone.

I then attempted to suppress this thought, which I knew could destabilize my dream, by dismissing the real world. Then, suddenly this pain struck me, it felt like my kidneys were ten times their size inside me, or that there was some kind of rope getting tighter and tighter over my waist. I took my seatbelt off, but it didn't help at all. It was really getting uncomfortable, so I gave up and, unfortunately, woke up. I woke up lying sideways, but I have no idea if it was the reason for that.

It's really unfortunate I woke up, though. Who knows when I'll get that vivid of a dream again.

Had this weird dream while taking an afternoon nap. From what I remember, it started off at some random university with a guy playing a recorder, while me and a few others were laughing ourselves off.

This teacher suddenly comes out of a room, unbelievably angry at us (speaking calmly though), to the point he sincerely wanted us to fail at anything thing we tried to do, saying we won't be allowed in his class, ever. Turns out we were his students, he was a chemistry professor.

I didn't really care since I was actually supposed to take that class the next semester and would just pick another, less bothersome teacher. Thing is, for some reason I decide to go in anyways, just to find the weirdest scenario I'd seen yet.

Class was dead silent. The teacher didn't even acknowledge my existence. One of the guys I was previously laughing with was up front, writing sequences of letters on the whiteboard, while another dude was making a digital circuit diagram beneath it.

I asked a girl who was beside where I sat down what the hell was going on, how bizarre this was. Apparently what the guys up front were doing was to accept they were wrong, and to be let back in to the class, knowing that they were going to be absolutely ripped to shreds when it came to grades no matter what score they got in tests.

I was commenting on how this was messed up, what kind of powers does this teacher perceive to hold, how in this case I was actually supportive of reporting the teacher to the chemistry department. Heard a "silence!" coming from him (directed at the entire class - we were the only ones talking, but he still had not acknowledged me), so I got my phone and signalled to keep talking over text.

This girl then starts saying I'm next, how I should not accept his "offer" (to be willingly screwed over) in any case. Suddenly, the teacher actually calls my phone. I had no idea how to react to all the nonsense going on. Went ahead and declined the call. Looked forwards, there he was. Looking through some sort of student registry, looking at my info.

He grabbed his phone, and I had now received a text from him, which I've read to be "Hello miss, I'm here to inform you of your son's misbehaviour and how it will affect his semester". What?

The guy was actually trying to report this, I don't even know how to describe it, to my family as if I was in high school or under. I just looked at him, in disbelief on how out of touch with reality this guy must be. Dream collapsed.

Definitively the weirdest dream I've had in terms of storytelling. Completely uncalled for as well, since I've never had any problems with my college teachers, especially since I've participated in engineering projects with some of them. Haven't been doing anything that would get me in trouble. Who knows.

This weekend my girlfriend woke me up, because I woke her up by repeatedly clenching my muscles. As far as I know, this has never happened to me.

The dream I was having was like a horror story and the killer was coming after me and my child (I don't have kids IRL) and I got a hold of a large fire extinguisher. I stealth hit him in the face, and then repeatedly just bashed his head in. He had a burlap sack over his face like a proper killer would, and we all know they never die on the first hit, but there was some definite anger release there. I was hitting him so hard it translated into the real world with muscle movements.

It was nuts.
